select seq_theater_no.nextval from dual
insert into theater values (#{theaterNo}, #{theaterName}, #{postCode}, #{address}, #{address2}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{phone}, #{homePage}, #{logoPath})
mapper.select: select theater_no theaterNo, theatername, postcode, address, address2, latitude, longitude, phone, homepage, logopath from theater where theater_no= #{theaterNo}
mapper.update: update theater set theatername= #{theaterName}, postcode= #{postCode}, address= #{address}, address2= #{address2}, phone= #{phone}, homepage= #{homePage}, logoPath= #{logoPath} where theater_no= #{theaterNo}
mapper.select: select rn, theaterNo, t.theatername theaterName, t.logopath logoPath, homepage, prodCnt, latitude, longitude from theater t, (select rownum rn, theatername, theaterNo, prodCnt, logopath from theater t, (select t.theater_no theaterNo, count(p.prod_no) prodCnt from theater t, hall h, product p where t.theater_no=h.theater_no and h.hall_no= p.hall_no group by t.theater_no order by prodCnt desc) o where t.theater_no= o.theaterno and logopath is not null) r where r.theaterNo= t.theater_no and rn between 1 and 15
select distinct t.theater_no theaterNo, theatername from theater t, hall h where t.theater_no= h.theater_no
